SEARCH

Package gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming

package gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming
  • Class
    Description
    ContainerModel
    Class: ContainerModel class is used to create a model of a container.
    CSV
    Class: CSV class is responsible for the creation of the .csv file that stores the data of the containers.
    DataBase
    Class: DataBase is responsible for interacting with the embedded form of H2 database.
    DataBaseThread
    Class: DataBaseThread is a class that contains methods that insert data in the tables so as to store the actions of the customer.
    ExecutorThreadCLI
    Class: ExecutorThreadCLI is a class that extends SuperThread and represents a command-line interface (CLI) implementation of an executor thread.
    ExecutorThreadGUI
    Class: ExecutorThreadGUI is a class that extends SuperThread and represents a graphical user interface (GUI) implementation of an executor thread.
    Graph
    Class: Graph class is responsible for the creation of the graph that shows the cpu usage of the container in real time.
    HttpInterface
    Interface: HttpInterface is an interface that is implemented by the SuperHttp class.
    Main
    Class: Main runs the entire program.
    ManagerAPI
    Class: ManagerAPI extends SuperAPI and provides methods for handling user input and managing container states using Docker commands.
    ManagerHttp
    Class: ManagerHttp is responsible for the http requests that are made to the docker daemon in order to start/stop a container or pull an image.
    ManagerHttpCLI
    ManagerHttpCLI class extends ManagerHttp and provides an implementation of managing Docker containers and images using HTTP requests.
    ManagerHttpGUI
    ManagerHttpGUI extends ManagerHttp and provides GUI-specific functionality for managing Docker containers using HTTP requests.
    MenuThread
    Class: MenuThread is a thread that prints the menu and handles the user's input.
    MenuThreadCLI
    MenuThreadCLI class represents the command-line interface (CLI) implementation of the main menu thread.
    MenuThreadGUI
    MenuThreadGUI class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) implementation of the main menu thread.
    MonitorAPI
    Class: MonitorAPI is a class that contains methods that retrieves information about the containers, it monitors the docker system.
    MonitorCluster
    Class: MonitorCluster is a class that contains methods that retrieves information about the nodes of the docker cluster, it monitors the docker system.
    MonitorHttp
    Class: MonitorHttp is responsible for the http requests that are made to the docker daemon in order to get information about a container, get statistics about a running container or search for an image.
    MonitorHttpCLI
    Class: MonitorHttpCLI extends MonitorHttp Description: Provides CLI-specific implementation for monitoring Docker containers through HTTP requests.
    MonitorHttpGUI
    Class: MonitorHttpGUI extends MonitorHttp This class provides HTTP-related functionality for the graphical user interface.
    MonitorHttpSuper
    MonitorHttpSuper serves as a base class for HTTP-related functionality in the monitoring system.
    MonitorThreadCLI
    MonitorThreadCLI is a thread class specifically designed for command-line interface (CLI) interactions in the monitoring system.
    MonitorThreadGUI
    MonitorThreadGUI is a thread class designed for graphical user interface (GUI) interactions in the monitoring system.
    SuperAPI
    Class: SuperAPI is a superclass that contains a static variable, used in other classes, representing the docker client.
    SuperHttp
    Class: SuperHttp is a superclass that contains static variables, used in other classes, representing the docker client and the http requests.
    SuperThread
    Class: SuperThread is a superclass that contains a static variable, used in other classes, representing the user input collected by the MenuThread.
